goal.ch:
1. 展示對於應用語言學教學問題的理解。
2.透過跨文化溝通探討語言本質。
3. 透過教學媒體支持專業創新。
4. 開發可以實際應用的互動程序。
goal.en:
1. To demonstrate an understanding of pedagogical issues in applied linguistics.
2. To explore the nature of language through intercultural communication.
3. To support professional innovations through instructional media.
4. To develop interactional procedures that could be used in practice.

outline.ch: 本課程主要介紹目前英語教學的趨勢。我們將在不同的環境調查流行的教學方法和途徑。我們也將透過視頻觀察，交際活動，同儕授課，和小組專題研習，探討英語教學中的議題。學生將可以實際應用語言學和互動程序於英語教學中。
outline.en: This course introduces current trends in the teaching of English to speakers of other languages (TESOL). We will survey popular methods and approaches in different educational contexts. We will also explore pedagogical issues in TESOL through video observations, communicative activities, peer lessons, and group projects. Students will develop linguistic and interactional procedures that could be used in practice.

textbook.ch: Brown, H. D. ＆ Lee, H. (2015). Teaching by Principles: An Interactive Approach to Language Pedagogy (4th ed). NY: Pearson Education.
